Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Camera
      • Player

  • public class Player
extends Camera
    Author:
    asampath803 This class represents the player, a type of camera that is affected by gravity, collides with blocks edits by: Ameya, Aayush

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(Block start)

      • Player

        public Player(float w,
              float h,
              float d,
              float speed,
              float xSensitivity,
              float ySensitivity,
              float friction,
              float fov,
              float viewDistance)
        Parameters:
        w - Width of the player
        h - Height of the player
        d - Depth of the player
        speed - How fast the player moves
        xSensitivity - Mouse sensitivity on the x-axis
        ySensitivity - Mouse sensitivity on the y-axis
        friction - The amount of friction the player experiences while moving
        fov - The player's field of view
        viewDistance - How far the player can look in the distance

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act(java.util.ArrayList<Block> blocks)
        Checks to see if the player is colliding with any of the Block objects inside the specified ArrayList
        Parameters:
        blocks - ArrayList of Block objects to check collision with

        public void moveTo(float x,
                   float y,
                   float z)
        Sets the position of the player to the given coordinates
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of where to move the player
        y - y-coordinate of where to move the player
        z - z-coordinate of where to move the player
